name: coordinate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: coordinate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make many different things work effectively as a whole

example.eg: We need someone to coordinate the whole campaign.
example.egtrans: 我们需要有个人来协调整个活动。

example.eg: A number of charities are coordinating their efforts to distribute food to the region.
example.egtrans: 几家慈善机构通力协作为该地区分发食品。

dsense.name: coordinate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to match or look attractive together

example.eg: The bed linen coordinates with the bedroom curtains.
example.egtrans: 床单和卧室的窗帘很相配。
搭配得体的上衣和裙子

name: coordinate
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: coordinate
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: one of a pair of numbers and/or letters that show the exact position of a point on a map or graph

dsense.name: coordinate
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: clothes, especially for women, that are made in matching colours or styles so that they can be worn together
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: （尤指颜色、样式协调的女性）配套服装，套装
